Question
========

Suppose it is given that for a given patient population, the hemoglobin (Hb) level is normally distributed with μ = 11.1 and σ = 1.2. We randomly draw one person from this population. How high should the Hb of this person be at most to belong to the lowest 15% of the population? belong?

Answerlist
----------

* 9.8388
* 9.8563
* 9.9238
* 10.1262

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 9.8388: Incorrect
* 9.8563: Correct
* 9.9238: Incorrect
* 10.1262: Incorrect
